npm

npm is a package manager for node. You can use it to install and publish your node programs. It manages dependencies and does other cool stuff.

Not much here at the moment. Check out the git repository.

Want some swag!? Go get some! All profits go towards buying more swag to hand out at NodeJS meetups and incentivize contributors.

Hate swag!? Donate anyway! All profits go towards the npm marketing budget, and may be drawn upon to buy pizza when noders congregate.
